metadata.title: CVE-2012-1589 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Open redirect vulnerability in the Form API in Drupal 7.x before 7.13allows remote attackers to redirect users to arbitrary web sites andconduct phishing attacks via crafted parameters in a destination URL.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-1589` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

drupal7 - 7.14-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in trusty/esm, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.14-1').
